#include <iostream>
#include<string>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {   int i=0,k=0;
        string a;
        cin>>a;
        while(a[i]!='\0')
        { k+=(int)a[i];
            i+=1;
        }
        k=k/i;
        cout<<(char)k<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
